languages.text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against their allies, it will apply {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Easy Target{/g} to them until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against their allies, it will apply {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Easy Target{/g} to them until the end of combat.

languages.text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against its allies, it inflicts the {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Broken Defence{/g} effect that lasts until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Совершая успешную атаку против своих союзников, это существо накладывает на них эффект {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}брешь в защите{/g}, который длится до конца боя. Не суммируется.

languages.text: 每当此生物命中盟友时，都会对被命中的目标施加{g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}防御破碎{/g}效果，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against its allies, it inflicts the {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Broken Defence{/g} effect that lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物命中盟友时，都会对被命中的目标施加{g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}防御破碎{/g}效果，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Chaque fois que cette créature exécute une attaque réussie contre ses alliés, elle inflige l'effet {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Défense brisée{/g}, qui dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against its allies, it inflicts the {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Broken Defence{/g} effect that lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Cada vez que esta criatura impacte contra sus aliados, inflige el efecto {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}defensa quebrada{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: この生物が味方に対して攻撃を成功させると、戦闘終了まで続く{g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}防御破綻{/g}効果を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against its allies, it inflicts the {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Broken Defence{/g} effect that lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: この生物が味方に対して攻撃を成功させると、戦闘終了まで続く{g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}防御破綻{/g}効果を与える。

languages.text: Bu yaratık, dost birimlerine başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Savunmada Gedik{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature makes a successful attack against its allies, it inflicts the {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Broken Defence{/g} effect that lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, dost birimlerine başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Savunmada Gedik{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Gelingt dieser Kreatur ein Angriff auf ihre Verbündeten, bewirkt sie bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|f:c6dfd282dab54411adb3c5fa980824fd}Durchbrochene Verteidigung{/g}.
